title: April 11th & 12th declared public holidays
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A circular has been issued declaring 11th and 12th April 2022 as public holidays, according to the Secretary to the Ministry of Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government.
